content: Adds three lemmas for univ. power series over comm. rings: The n-th coefficient of the k-th power of a power series; First coefficient of the product of two power series; First coefficient of the n-th power of a power series with constant coefficient 1.
Could you please provide feedback on this PR?
#14452 (just repeating the PR number so I can follow the link on mobile)
(btw -- the easy label is intended for even easier PRs: I think the rule of thumb is 20secs reviewing time. :-)
